inputCompany.title: inputCompany
inputCompany.description: company that the lead works for, as interpreted by agent and dictated by the end user

inputDescription.title: inputDescription
inputDescription.description: Notes about the interaction. these will come from a description of the interaction or otherwise an explanation of what the lead was interested in, what they talked about, etc.

inputEmail.title: inputEmail
inputEmail.description: email address of the lead, as entered by the user

inputFirstName.title: inputFirstName
inputFirstName.description: first name of the lead, as interpreted by the agent and dictated by the user

inputLastName.title: inputLastName
inputLastName.description: last name of the lead entered from agent conversation

inputTitle.title: inputTitle
inputTitle.description: title of the lead, as interpreted from agent
